channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - firewall

item.title: How far reaching vulnerabilities can go
item.description: If you follow the news a bit, you know that PostgreSQL has had a significant security vulnerability. The PostgreSQL team announced it up front and communicated how they would deal with the vulnerability (which basically comes down to saying that it is severe, that the public repositories will be temporarily â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
